tool_description:
Take advantage of Microsoft's Azure AI Text To Speech functionality.
Support for over 140+ languages and 480+ different (male/female) voices!
name: Azure AI Speech
title: Azure AI Speech

api_list.name: languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://azure-ai-speech.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "azure-ai-speech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://azure-ai-speech.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "azure-ai-speech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: voices
api_list.description:
Lists all supported voices per language.
Voices can also be filtered based on language.
